overview: A short film that tells the story of the Polish Dawid, a homosexual guy who lives in a now former LGBT-free zone. He loves his city and has basically everything his heart desires. However, he is intimidated and threatened on a daily basis. And he's not the only one. Queer rights are being violated in Poland. How is it possible that these zones exist and how do you survive as a queer person in such a place?
title: Queer in the Zone
